thread.title: Jennifer Hudson has pair of jeans named after her
thread.title_full: Jennifer Hudson has pair of jeans named after her

title: Jennifer Hudson has pair of jeans named after her
text:
Jennifer Hudson has pair of jeans named after her Jennifer Hudson has pair of jeans named after her 
Jennifer Hudson has had a pair of jeans named after her after collaborating with the brand New York & Company. 
Jennifer Hudson has had a pair of jeans named after her. 
The 'Dreamgirls' actress has teamed up with New York & Company to create the perfect pair of high-waisted jeans for curvaceous figures, named the Jennifer Hudson Jean. 
Jennifer told People magazine: ''For me, comfort is everything so I really appreciate the high waist and super soft feel of the jeans, and yet they still look amazing because of their curve-flattering fit. 
''I'm excited to offer this curated collection of my favourite pieces to the New York & Company woman.'' 
Jennifer pairs her signature jeans - which are available today (22.10.15) on nyandcompany.com - with a classic black turtleneck in the campaign images. 
In addition to Jennifer's work on the brand's denim collection, they have also enlisted the help of 'The Place Beyond the Pines' actress Eva Mendes . 
The 41-year-old beauty collaborated on a range of flirty, floral pieces after she admitted she's ''definitely not a 'jeans' girl''. 
She explained previously: ''I'm a dress and skirt girl, and I think that I gravitate towards things that are very feminine.'' Contactmusic
